ThingDef.Name: TM_StoneGolem_Base
ThingDef.description: A simple golem crafted from stone and animated with magic.

ThingDef.label: mecha-golem
ThingDef.description: A golem, crafted from raw material and given basic autonomy through a combination of circuitry and magic.

ThingDef.label: flesh golem
ThingDef.description: A golem crafted from the flesh, bones and organs of other beings and given basic autonomy through a combination of bioengineering and magic.

ThingDef.label: hollow golem
ThingDef.description: A golem crafted from condensed magic and arcane catalysts. The armor surrounding the hollow golem anchors the magic center to a physical location and to protect its physical integrity. The hollow golem is able to harness tremendous amounts of magical energy for a variety of purposes, making it one of the most flexible golems developed to date. The hollow golem absorbs magical energy from the atmosphere, much like paracyte, with mana reduction equivalent to 10 paracyte thorn bushes.

ThingDef.label: maharal golem
ThingDef.description: A golem crafted from a mixture of molded stone wrapped in leather.
